name: Shoot em bots!
description:
game made in godot

if you get 100 points you are a epic gamer!

use W/S/UP/DOWN/SPACE to shoot down and go up

use A/D/Q/E/LEFT/RIGHT to shoot left and go right

the goal is to kill as many robots as you can

this is the first game i made in godot so its pretty bad and probably pretty hard >:)
